title: Pixel 2 XL changing wallpaper daily (images not native to the phone)
content:
This is not a case of "daily wallpaper" being turned on.  These images are not native to the wallpaper app.  Today's features a windows logo for example.  I uninstalled all potentially shady apps and am left with only big name, very common apps.  

When I change the image it just will change again the next day to another random image, often times they have an anime theme.

Help!
